attributes.action: Provide a facility on petitions.pm.gov.uk where users may indicate 'This Is A Stupid Idea' to an open petition.  (Actual phrasing to be determined).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If these opponents reach a threshold number, say 250,000 people, then anyone supporting the petition is automatically disenfranchised. (OK, that part will never happen, but wouldn't it be a great way of improving the quality of UK democracy?) But I was serious about the need for a capability to disagree with petitions.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
